title: Bundle set items
body:
A full set is a thing, so it would make sense to be able to trade a full set. So maybe bundling items would be a nice thing to have so you don't need to list every item separately.

Bundles in general could also be handy in the sense of buying/selling.
author: 0x3BBF5B5e873543dc90bCaEe9BC98bd8CcD06e60f
